Truly the BEST way to play Half-Life. The lighting is SO good, the explosions, RAGDOLL PHYSICS! It even has a flashlight... And the janitor too! The janitor is my favourite character! I just cannot put into WORDS how BETTER this game is than the original golDsRc version. It's also such a good GMod DLC! If you haven't played Half-Life: Source, have you even played Half-Life at all then?
Pizza box humans :) lol but currenty this is one of the best fps ive played this is proof old games are better then current gen

Only get this if you're getting a bundle that also comes with regular Half Life 1 like the Valve Complete pack or Half Life Complete pack either to play after the original HL out of curiosity or for GMod. Otherwise I can't recommend it because it's just so much buggier than the original.

While I think it isn't as bad as other people say it is I still can't recommend it, I just finished it and I don't see why you would choose this over the original GoldSrc one. There is a lot of bugs sometimes like the residue processing chapter bugging out but really that and a few other small things is what I experienced. Just go buy the real Half-Life (and also Black Mesa)
I didn't think this game could be as cursed as it is.

Not long after, few days later, I went to the fridge, saw our jug in there. What's in it? A syrup. Yes! Here we go again! Lift the jug and fill my mouth with that thick, sweet juice! *sluuurp* Bleaaaaugh!! This isn't peach, this is... Bleeugheh! My mouth is full of oil! Thick cooking oil!

The bugs in this game, while annoying, are usually not game-breaking and it didn't hurt my experience that badly. I also liked the graphical upgrades for the most part, especially in surface tension. Although, I recommend this ONLY if you have played the original Half-Life, as that is still the better overall experience. But at the end of the day, it's still Half-Life.

Half-Life: Source is not a great way to play through the original Half-Life, released in 2004, it was stated to be a remaster of the original game. Now a remaster by definition is the same game, just with updated graphics & audio. However, that is not the case. It was just the original Half-Life, ported over to the Source engine, with nothing changed. Not only that, but is seems that the graphics are worse than the original GoldSrc version. Also, there are way too many bugs & glitches throughout the game that make it very hard to enjoy. There have even been instances of the game just crashing on me for no reason. This is not a great way to play the Original Half-Life. If you want to play it, i recommend the original, or the fan made remake, Black Mesa. 5/10
still better than hunt down the refund

Trying out the game again after a long time to see if it's as bad as people say:
-Guard doesn't let me into test chamber despite me wearing HEV
-MP5 recoil fuckd up for player, marines still have laser accurate aim
-Every texture has been lathered in oil and gloss and polished to a mirror sheen

Ragdolls kinda cool though.
